applet_name: Whenever you are mentioned on Twitter, post a message to Telegram
applet_description: Feedback, anyone? Get notified of new Twitter mentions right inside Telegram ‚Äî¬†or share mentions of the company Twitter to a group of colleagues.

applet_name: Send new Feed items to a Telegram chat
applet_description: Whenever one of your favorite Feeds has a new item, send a message to a Telegram chat.

applet_name: Use the Button widget to share your current location with a Telegram chat
applet_description: With the press of a button, share your location with a Telegram chat. Includes a map image of your current location and a Google Maps URL.

applet_name: Forward twitter feed to telegram
applet_description: Forwards a specific applet feed to an IFTTT connected telegram channel.
applet_Trigger: New tweet by a specific user

applet_name: Divert Android sms To Telegram
applet_description: When you get new sms it  divert it to telegram for you

applet_name: Tweet new text posts from your Telegram channel
applet_description: An easy way to share new texts posted in your Telegram channel to Twitter. Your tweet will include a direct link to the post on Telegram, so don't worry too much about the character limit. Note that the @IFTTT bot needs to be an admin in your channel for this to work. P.S. Funny syntax optional STOP

applet_name: Twitter 2 Telegram Pic
applet_description: Twitter 2 Telegram Pic
applet_Trigger: New tweet by a specific user

applet_name: blogger to telegram @IFTTT Bot
applet_description: Post new blogger updates on your telegram channel and groups

applet_name: Send app notification to Telegram
applet_description: When you get a notification from a specific app, the notification will be forwarded to a Telegram chat.
applet_Trigger: Notification received from a specific app

applet_name: Automatically post a daily reminder to a Telegram chat
applet_description: Pick the days of the week and time to send encouraging messages like "Lunch break, everyone!" or "Now back to work, you maggots!" to your coworkers in a Telegram chat.
applet_Trigger: Every day of the week at

applet_name: Every time you post a new Instagram photo, share it to a Telegram chat
applet_description: Spread your photo-sharing tentacles to new regions at no added cost. This will automatically send new photos you post on Instagram to a Telegram group or channel.

applet_name: Use Email to send Telegram message
applet_description: Send an email to    trigger@applet.ifttt.com    with  "  #telegram  "  in the subject in order to trigger the IFTTT bot, then simply write your message as you would do for a regular email. Target chat needs to be choosen when you turn on the applet.

applet_name: Send message when video uploaded
applet_description: Send message to your Telegram channel when uploaded new public video to YouTube by you
applet_Trigger: New public video uploaded by you

applet_name: Add your YouTube videos to a Telegram channel or chat
applet_description: This applet runs command to post your YouTube videos posted on a Telegram chat or channel
applet_Trigger: New public video uploaded by you

applet_name: Get the daily forecast in Telegram
applet_description: Choose a time and get detailed info about today's weather in Telegram, come rain or shine.

applet_name: When a user you subscribe to uploads a new YouTube video, share it with a Telegram chat
applet_description: Every time a particular subscriber you follow on YouTube posts a new video, a link to the video will be shared with the Telegram chat you specify.

applet_name: Instagram video to Telegram chat
applet_description: When you upload a video to Instagram, it'll be sent to a Telegram chat

applet_name: Earthquake in your country ? Receive Telegram notification
applet_description: Receive Telegram message when an earthquake is registered in your country

applet_name: Auto post from telegram to facebook page
applet_description:
Write post on telegram channel it will be post into facebook page also.

applet_name: Send any new photo to my telegram
applet_description: send any new photo made by android camera to telegram

applet_name: Facebook Pages Post to Telegram
applet_description: Send a post from your Facebook Page to a Telegram channel or group.

applet_name: liked Tweets to telegram channel
applet_description: liked Tweets to telegram channel

applet_name: Post Facebook photos to telegram
applet_description: The posts your new Facebook pages photos to telegram

applet_name: Telegram Find My Phone
applet_description: This applet finds your phone using telegram. Just send "find my phone" @IFTTT. It uses voip calls so it works also outside of USA and Canada
applet_Trigger: New message with key phrase to @IFTTT

applet_name: Send me a message on telegram for any call missed
applet_description: send a message on telegram with ContactName  for any call missed

applet_name: Share the quote of the day via Telegram
applet_description: This Applet sends the BrainyQuote quote of the day to the Telegram chat of your choosing.

applet_name: Event from search to Telegram
applet_description: Remind your friends or colleagues of an upcoming event.

applet_name: Its gonna rain
applet_description: Sends you a telegram message if its going to rain

applet_name: Upload photos to Google Drive using Telegram
applet_description: Send a photo to the @IFTTT bot on Telegram to save it on Google Drive. Great for poor network conditions - chances are it'll be much easier to send a pic via Telegram rather than uploading it to GDrive :)

applet_name: Automatically share your posts in a Telegram chat
applet_description: When you publish something new, the content will be posted in the chat of your choice. Cool Telegram sticker not included üòé

applet_name: Repost photos from Reddit to a Telegram channel.
applet_description: This applet reposts only photos. No captions, titles, etc.

applet_name: forward SMS to Telegram group chat if it contains a search phrase
applet_description: When you receive an SMS with certain phrase or number, forward it through Telegram to a group chat.

applet_name: Android Notification in Telegram Private Chat @ifttt bot
applet_description: Send Message to Telegram when Android get a notification

applet_name: When device turns on/off, message me on Telegram
applet_description: When a 1-channel switch/plug is turned on/off, send me a notification via Telegram.

applet_name: SMS + Telegram at once
applet_description: Send a SMS + Telegram message at the same time. Great if your recipient is forgetful!
applet_Trigger: New SMS sent to phone number

applet_name: Avvisa su telegram quando vai in streaming
applet_description: Invia un messaggio in automatico con il link della streaming appena inizia su twitch

applet_name: Create a new task in Todoist by messaging @IFTTT in Telegram
applet_description: Send a message to @IFTTT starting with 'Create task' to create a new task in Todoist. E.g. 'Create task Call grandma to wish her a happy birthday'
applet_Trigger: New message with key phrase to @IFTTT

applet_name: Get sms, Send email and telegram
applet_description: When received a new sms, send to your gmail and telegram

applet_name: If enter or exit an area, send message through telegram
applet_description: Whenever you enter or exit an area, send message through telegram to the targeted chat.
applet_Trigger: You enter or exit an area

applet_name: Quickly send photos to a Telegram chat with the Camera widget
applet_description: A great way to quickly share photos with a Telegram chat.

applet_name: Bitcoin Chart & Price
applet_description: Send a Bitcoin chart to a Telegram chat or group. The data is obtained from the @BNC_Markets Twitter account.
applet_Trigger: New tweet by a specific user

applet_name: Share tracks you add to a Spotify playlist to a Telegram group or channel
applet_description: An easy way to share your favorite tracks on Spotify to the followers of your Telegram channel! Every time you add a track to the playlist you specify, a message will be posted to a Telegram channel that you're an admin of.
applet_Trigger: New track added to a playlist

applet_name: Get a message on Telegram when a Rust Smart Alarm is triggered
applet_description: Make sure you don't miss any alarms that are triggered in Rust, get a message on Telegram when an alarm is triggered

applet_name: Notify prayer time on Telegram
applet_description: Muslim prayer notifications on Telegram chat

applet_name: documentos a telegram
applet_description: documentos a telegram

applet_name: Send a Telegram Message when EZVIZ triggers an Alarm
applet_description: Send a Telegram Message when EZVIZ triggers an Alarm

applet_name: Spotify Telegram alerts
applet_description: Share new playlist tracks to a Telegram chat
applet_Trigger: New track added to a playlist

applet_name: 4/20 my dudes
applet_description: Remeber to celebrate 4/20
